.. Coord documentation master file


Coord is a Python module that provides basic functionality related to angles and
celestial coordinates.  It is hosted at https://github.com/LSSTDESC/Coord.

Overview
========

    overview
    deschool

    angleunit
    angle
    celestial
    util
